*,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:inherit}html{font-size:62.5%}body{box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff}h1,h2,h4{margin-bottom:1.5em}h1{font-size:2.5rem}img{max-width:100%}.navbar{background:#deddf6;background:-moz-linear-gradient(90deg,#deddf6 0,#e9492e 50%,#e7a21d 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(90deg,#deddf6,#e9492e 50%,#e7a21d);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#deddf6,#e9492e 50%,#e7a21d);filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="#deddf6",endColorstr="#e7a21d",GradientType=1);padding-bottom:10px}.navbar
